name: Manual Farm
uniques: Can also be built on tiles adjacent to fresh water
Pillaging this improvement yields approximately [+18 Gold]

civilopediaText.text: Human society tend to rely on agriculture more than anything, especially after they invented taxes. If you see this improvement in lake? They probably started to throw dirt into the lake and make it the new farmland.

name: Manual Plantation
uniques: Can only be built to improve a resource
Pillaging this improvement yields approximately [+18 Gold]

civilopediaText.text: Planting crops other than common vegetable and carbonhydrate rich crops takes many trials and error, eventually this experimentation pays off. Because the silk from silk road, spice from spice trade comes from somewhere.

name: Mechanised Farm
uniques: Pillaging this improvement yields approximately [+36 Gold]

civilopediaText.text: With invention of many machines that can replace humble cows and farmers. The farm becomes automated
